video.title: Cult
video.synopsis: A production assistant teams up with a journalist to investigate her show's obsessive fans -- and their possible involvement in copycat crimes.

episodes.synopsis: When investigative reporter Jeff Sefton's brother disappears, Jeff uncovers the dark underworld of the television show "Cult" and its rabid fans.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Jeff enlists tech-savvy E.J. to help in his search. Skye reveals to Jeff that she took the job on "Cult" to learn more about its executive producer.
episodes.title: In the Blood

episodes.synopsis: Jeff finds a visitor in Nate's apartment who tells him about a dangerous game Nate's been hosting, which involves role-playing scenes from "Cult."
episodes.title: Being Billy

episodes.synopsis: Jeff and Skye are introduced to a man who deprograms cult members, while E.J. makes a discovery that could bring them one stop closer to finding Nate.
episodes.title: Get with the Program

episodes.synopsis: Jeff and Skye attend a "Cult" costume party, where Skye is drugged with a hallucinogen and Roger meets a mysterious stranger named Stuart.
episodes.title: The Kiss

episodes.synopsis: Skye suffers a serious reaction to the drug she was slipped the night before, and Jeff must find a sample in order to save her life.
episodes.title: The Good Fight

episodes.synopsis: When Jeff and Skye investigate Detective Sakelik's suspicious past as an abandoned child, they barely escape with their lives.
episodes.title: Suffer the Children

episodes.synopsis: Jeff and Skye try to find evidence against Sakelik to use as leverage to gain information on Nate. Stuart invites Roger for a weekend at his estate.
episodes.title: The Devil You Know

episodes.synopsis: Skye plans to infiltrate a meeting of the True Believers with Jeff following close behind. But Jeff unknowingly follows a decoy vehicle...
episodes.title: Off to See the Wizard

episodes.synopsis: Jeff and Skye continue their search for Nate, while the actress who plays Meadow is spooked by a pair of figures from her childhood.
episodes.title: The Prophecy of St. Clare

episodes.synopsis: Jeff and Skye break into Stuart's offices on the studio lot and discover a surveillance room with hidden camera feeds.
episodes.title: Flip the Script

episodes.synopsis: Jeff and Skye remain in hiding from the True Believers while Nate tries to get a message to Jeff. Billy captures the killer of Kelly's parents.
Jeff makes Stuart an offer to exchange Nate for answers, but Nate convinces Jeff that they need to see this mystery through to its conclusion.
episodes.title: Executive Producer Steven Rae
